attributes.action:
Build another road off Canvey Island &
stop authorising new builds.
attributes.additional_details: The traffic in the area is beyond ridiculous. 3 hours for a 20 minute journey.  In an already hard time financially for all we are burning money sitting in traffic which is also causing high omissions. Not to mention mental stress for all concerned.
attributes.background:
Pay for another road to be built.
Stop authorising new builds and retail parks.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
